Field.tooltip: Controls the amount of debug information written to the log.
Field.Label: Debug level:

Always be careful when posting debug output to the forums or other public places. You should review it to ensure that it doesn't contain sensitive information.
Debugging Messages = Step by step plugin logging. Informational Messages = Useful information about plugin health. Warning Messages = Warnings about settings that may conflict. Error Messages = Error messages you might want to address. Critical Errors Only = Critical errors that should probably be reported.
